Improvements.Improvement: Use Java Optional for null safety
Improvements.Description: Instead of directly calling methods on `apiMethodDoc`, use `Optional.ofNullable` to avoid potential NullPointerExceptions.

Improvements.Improvement: Create a private method to handle conditional assignment
Improvements.Description: A part of the code is checking the content type and assigning request parameters based on that. This can be moved to a separate private method to reduce the complexity of the main method and increase readability.
